text:
[Verse]
Neon night so bright can't hide
City streets they come alive
People dance in flashing lights
Energy it fills the skies

[Chorus]
City lights they're shining
Hearts awake they're finding
Rhythm in the sound
Feet off the ground

[Verse 2]
Crowded alley music loud
Voices mix within the crowd
Echoes bounce off towering walls
Endless possibilities call

[Chorus]
City lights they're shining
Hearts awake they're finding
Rhythm in the sound
Feet off the ground

[Bridge]
Chasing dreams no end in sight
Underneath electric skies
Lost in moments yet to find
City lights they free our minds

[Chorus]
City lights they're shining
Hearts awake they're finding
Rhythm in the sound
Feet off the ground
title: City Lights
